alert.note: Alert for Emanuel; Montgomery; Telfair; Toombs; Wheeler (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 6:18AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Heavy rain and strong winds will impact portions of southeastern Emanuel, Toombs, southeastern Telfair, southeastern Wheeler and southern Montgomery Counties through 645 AM EST... At 617 AM EST, a line of heavy showers and embedded thunderstorms extended from Garfield to near Higgston to 6 miles northeast of Horse Creek Wma, and moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Lyons, Vidalia, Twin City, Lumber City, Uvalda, Stillmore, Oak Park, Higgston, Garfield, Santa Claus, Alston, Ohoopee, New Branch, McNatt Falls, South Thompson, English Eddy, Cedar Crossing, Johnson Corner, George L Smith State Park and Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
